location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Captain H Davidson, Commander of HC Cruizer Ternate

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying intelligence the Resident has received regarding the location of the Country Ship Rhaim Shaw, which fled the Bushire Roads as a result of the arrest of the Governor of Bushire, Mahomed Jaffer Kaun [Muḥammad Ja‘afar Khān]; the Captain of the HC Cruizer Ternatehas been tasked with finding and returning the ship in question, and is instructed to proceed to Bussora [Basra] in search of her.
